activities: Personal informtion received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland may be transmitted to the US for standard business purposes and operations (i.e. client names, addresses, and contact information) and for the  administration of applicant and employee data.
personaldata: Customer/Client data (i.e. name, address, and contact information), employee data/general employment information.  This does include manually processed data.
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities; For all other data: unresolved complaints are referred to the American Aribtration Association for resolution.
